data.name: Lost Beyond
data.detailed_description:
Lost Beyond is an Adventure Exploration game, where you play as a hiker whose entire reality is about the shift.

A harmless trip to Canyons is about to unveil great mysteries, after you get trapped in underground caves. While trying to find a way out, you find a way in. A portal which takes you to alternate dimension, where reality is not like we know it.

Find your way through a mysterious environment, piece together the clues that can lead you where you truly want to be, and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness. But be aware, not everything is as it seems to be.

Are you ready for a adventure of a lifetime?


Lost Beyond is also one of the first games created with Next-Gen game engine, Unreal Engine 5. Experience visuals like never before, immerse yourself in this beautiful environment, and welcome to the Future of Gaming!

data.short_description: Lost Beyond is a Adventure Exploration game where your main quest becomes finding a way back to your dimension. Embark on a journey, find your way through a vast and mysterious environment and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600k / AMD Ryzen 5 1600x
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700k / Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
